name: Dafydd Ab Hugh
bio: Dafydd ab Hugh is an author whose novelette, "The Coon Rolled Down and Ruptured His Larinks, A Squeezed Novel by Mr. Skunk" in Asimov's Science Fiction, was nominated for a Nebula Award in 1990. Simon & Schuster has published eleven ab Hugh novels in the Doom and Star Trek franchises.
